sect1.title: Introduction
sect1.para: ECL Watch provides an interface to the HPCC system and allows you to view information and interrogate nodes to confirm all expected processes are running. This provides a simple Web-based view into the system and a means to perform Workunit and data files maintenance.
This document briefly describes new ECL Watch functionality which will be available in HPCC 4.x.

On the ECL Watch page, there are links in the Navigator panel under the Tech Preview heading. The links below the header open the respective pages for the new ECL Watch. There are pages available through the Tech Preview that allow you to access ECL Workunits, DFU Workunits, and Logical Files.
For the preview period, these pages are only available through the Tech Preview link. These redesigned pages with the improved functionality will later replace ECL Watch.
